mng: benefit, profit, advantage, beneficial, to increase, to add, all the more

exm.mng: benefit, profit, advantage, beneficial, to increase, to add, all the more
to grow the intellect, Alpinia oxyphylla, a type of ginger (Chinese medicine)
day by day, more and more, increasingly, more and more with each passing day
benefit, advantage, profit, to be a benefit to
to perfect sth that is already outstanding (idiom); constantly improving
no good, not good for, not beneficial
collecting opinions is of wide benefit (idiom); to pool wisdom for mutual benefit, to profit from widespread suggestions
to make life longer, to promise longevity, (this product will) extend your life
